did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Briegleb Collection,
did.abstract: Letters, reports, and memoranda, relating to the political and economic situation in Germany and in Eastern Europe, primarily from 1945-1949, the Nuremberg war crime trials, and communism in Germany after World War II.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
